channel.title: Need help with the last steps of making own server
channel.description:
-Ok, i loaded TestScape and i putted in everything. Like: banning players, killing players on command, talking NPC's,... -I rewrote Compile.bat and RunServer.bat with:
@echo off title yourservernamehere "C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injava.exe" server pause
and:
@echo off title yourservernamehere java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar serve
-i got no-ip.com account - i got "java 5.0 JDK update 9 with NetBeans" or something... -i got MoparScape V3.2 Downloaded -i can enter my server
The only thing that don't works is...
*The changes i putted in like:
-banning players, killing players on command, talking NPC's,... (and much more) is not on my server.
now... What am i doing wrong???????!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!?????? :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.title: Need help with the last steps of making own server
item.dc:creator: @oh_yeah oh yeah
item.description:
@oh_yeah wrote:

Np anymore guys, found the problem. FIXED

now i get this message:

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server
press any key to continue . . .

pretty good fo a noobish coder like me

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @oh_yeah oh yeah
item.description:

changed setting in Compile.bat and Runserver.bat

that’s the message if i compile:

antilag(1).java:4: class antilag is public, should be declared in a file named a
ntilag.java

^

ient.java

s.java

^

Cryption.java

^

n a file named GraphicsHandler.java

^

va

^

2.java

^

.java

^

named ItemHandler.java

^

ItemList.java

^

n a file named itemspawnpoints.java

^

va

^

public class NPC {
^

NPCDrops.java

^

amed NPCHandler.java

^

PCList.java

^

yer.java

^

file named PlayerHandler.java

amed PlayerSave.java

ver.java

named ShopHandler.java

eam.java

^

Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server
Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .

now it has 23 errors and i didn’t put anything into client.java…

item.title: Need help with the last steps of making own server
item.dc:creator: @oh_yeah oh yeah
item.description:
@oh_yeah wrote:

-Ok, i loaded TestScape and i putted in everything. Like: banning players, killing players on command, talking NPC’s,…
-I rewrote Compile.bat and RunServer.bat with:

@echo off
title yourservernamehere
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injava.exe” server
pause

and:

@echo off
title yourservernamehere
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar serve

-i got no-ip.com account

  • i got “java 5.0 JDK update 9 with NetBeans” or something…
    -i got MoparScape V3.2 Downloaded
    -i can enter my server

The only thing that don’t works is…

*The changes i putted in like:

-banning players, killing players on command, talking NPC’s,… (and much more) is not on my server.

now… What am i doing wrong???
